Summary

Motivated and versatile IT professional, experienced in web technologies, designing/developing software applications while being familiar with Conceptual Modelling and UML. Possesses first-rate communications skills to collaborate on all business levels while effectively dealing with the analysis of complex technical issues.

Team player, eager to contribute in implementation of demanding projects, seeks the next big career challenge and an opportunity to apply his knowledge and expertise on a larger scale.

Skills

Field Tech Stack
Back End Java (Socket Programming, Multithreading, Swing), Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Hibernate, J2EE (Servlets, Portlets, JSP, JSF, JDBC, JAX-RS [Jersey, Apache CXF]), Python, UML, ABAP, PostgreSQL, SQL, PL/SQL
Front End Javascript (jQuery), Typescript, Angular 5+, HTML, CSS, Jekyll
Testing TDD, JUnit, Mockito, TestNG, Selenium, JMeter, Postman Collections and Mock Servers
Buld and Deploy Jenkins, git, subversion, npm, maven, ant
Infrastructure Apache, Tomcat, AWS
Agile Process Kanban, standups
Architectures MVC, SOA, REST

Professional Experience

May 2017 - Today Hellenic Exchanges S.A. - Senior Software Engineer
  • Turning the build mechanism of the REST APIs infrastructure, for the Energy Exchange project, from Ant to Maven
  • Transformation of the Foreign Exchanges Feed Server to be compatible with new Feed Providers, resulting into more than 50% cost reduction
    • Java SE 7 (Socket Programming, multi-threading)
  • Development of a web client (GAS Auctions Platform) for DESFA
    • Angular 5 / Typescript
    • Java REST end-points (JAX-RS / CXF)

    • Java SE 6-7 (multi-threading, Socket Programming and prepared statements) / MS SQL
May 2014 - June 2017 Eworx S.A. - Software Engineer

August 2013 - May 2014 Improvit Ltd. - IT Consultant / Developer
  • Implementation of ABAP applications for Insurance Companies (ERGO Russia, ERGO Hellas)
July 2011 - August 2013 CyberStream Ltd. - Junior Software Engineer
